description: This Java class defines a data model for a 'Template' entity, representing a reusable pictogram template with customizable fields, stored in a MongoDB collection. It includes fields for name, description, asset URLs, default attributes, owner info, and timestamps, along with annotations for validation and database mapping.

classes.name: Template
classes.description: Represents a MongoDB document for a pictogram template with fields for name, description, assets, default attributes, owner ID, and timestamps, including constructors and getter/setter methods.

methods.name: Template
methods.description: Constructor initializing all fields of the Template class.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the template.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the template.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the template.

methods.name: getAssetUrls
methods.description: Returns the list of asset URLs.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the template.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the template.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the template.
